content.rendered:
As 2023 ushers in a new era of modernity and commercial growth, Gurgaon stands tall as a bustling hub of commerce, innovation, and style. Boasting a plethora of commercial shops catering to diverse needs and preferences, this rapidly evolving city has become a shopaholic’s paradise. Let’s talk about the most sought-after commercial shopping destinations in the vibrant city of Gurgaon.


In this comprehensive guide, we present to you the top 10 commercial shops in Gurgaon 2023that have captured the hearts of residents and visitors alike. From luxurious malls showcasing high-end brands to vibrant markets brimming with local treasures, Gurgaon offers a myriad of options to satiate your retail cravings. Let’s dive into the retail extravaganza that Gurgaon has to offer!


Signature Global Signum Plaza 79B

Signum Plaza 79B is an upscale high street retail destination situated in Sector 79B, Gurgaon. This rapidly developing area is witnessing a surging demand for retail spaces in Gurgaon. Signum Plaza 79B is poised to meet the diverse needs of customers, focusing on delivering an exceptional shopping experience. The retail shops will showcase a wide array of products and services, ranging from fashion and accessories to electronics and groceries. Visitors will benefit from ample parking facilities, while a beautifully landscaped area will provide an inviting space for relaxation and recreation. With excellent connectivity to Dwarka Expressway, NH-8, and Golf Course, Signature Global Signum Plaza 79B offers convenience and accessibility to all. Company is also offering lucrative scheme & offers to gain the interest of investors in this project.



Signature Global Signum Plaza 63A

Signum Plaza 63A is a vibrant and innovative retail destination within a residential project – Signature Global City 63A. This extraordinary high-street retail hub in Gurgaon showcases a diverse range of commercial shops for daily necessities and renowned branded stores. Designed to provide an unparalleled shopping experience, it serves as a magnet for both regular shoppers and luxury enthusiasts. Nestled within a well-established premium residential area, this commercial center enjoys close proximity to prominent landmarks in Gurgaon. With Golf Course Road, Sohna Road, and the Southern Peripheral Expressway via NH-8 nearby, the demand for this project among residents of the region is ever-increasing.


Signature Global Infinity Mall

Infinity Mall in Sector 36, Sohna stands proudly as a prominent landmark in the southern region of Gurgaon, marking the beginning of the Delhi-Mumbai Industrial Corridor. This prestigious project excels in the Livability Index, offering exceptional connectivity, advanced infrastructure, and a host of amenities. With its focus on serving over 1 Lakh+ affluent families and skilled professionals, Signature Global Infinity Mall provides an elevated retail and entertainment experience with a number of stores and commercial shops in Sohna. Positioned along Sohna Road, the mall benefits from its proximity to an upcoming 5-kilometer long, six-lane elevated road connecting Rajiv Chowk on NH8 to Badshahpur.


With Multi Brand Outlet already onboard, you can tap into a diverse range of popular brands and attract a thriving customer base. Also, pre-leased top food brands like Bikanerwala, Barbeque Company, Moti Mahal Deluxe, & Duty Free, ensure a robust customer footfall. The mall is anchored by Deerika, a leading hypermarket & features a state-of-the-art multiplex cinema hall, Cineport too. Furthermore imagine the possibilities with Mastizone, a renowned entertainment destination, already pre-leased within the mall.


By having these top brands as a tenant, Signature Global Infinity Mall ensures a lively and energetic atmosphere, fostering positive experiences that keep customers coming back for more.



Signature Global Signum Plaza 93

Signum Plaza 93 in sector 93 is an exceptional commercial project nestled in one of the most affluent sectors of New Gurgaon. This sophisticated 5-storey high-street retail shops, leisure, and entertainment destination is among the finest in Gurgaon. It has been meticulously designed to become a vibrant lifestyle hub, catering to the diverse needs of residents and neighboring communities. Offering a comprehensive range of essential services, including F&B outlets, cafes, grocery stores, and a delightful rooftop garden terrace for al-fresco dining, Signature Global Signum Plaza 93 ensures convenience and a delightful experience right at the residents’ doorstep.


Signature Global Signum Plaza 92

Signum Plaza 92 in sector 92 is where prosperity meets convenience. This is dynamic commercial project in Gurgaon and destination for individuals from diverse demographics. Whether you’re a necessity shopper or a lover of fun experiences, Signature Global Signum Plaza 92 is the one-stop destination that caters to all. Offering top-notch facilities and features, it stands as the latest and finest option for commercial shops in Gurgaon. Embrace the best of what new commercial space in Gurgaon has to offer at Signature Global Signum Plaza 92.



Signature Global Signum Plaza 81

Signum Plaza 81 in sector 81, an exceptional commercial property in Gurgaon that attracts a discerning clientele. With its strategic location and captivating aesthetics, this retail shop stands as the epitome of relevance for diverse demographics within society. Whether you’re a necessity shopper or someone seeking a fun-filled experience, Signature Global Signum Plaza 81 is the perfect destination for all.


Signature Global Signum Plaza 37D

Signum Plaza 37D is a remarkable commercial property which caters to a discerning clientele, offering a planned location and impressive aesthetics that make it the ultimate destination for individuals from diverse demographics. From necessity shoppers to those seeking fun-filled experiences, Signature Global Signum Plaza 37Dcaters to all. Furthermore, its advantageous proximity to key employment hubs such as Cyber City, Manesar, and more adds to its appeal. Major corporate centers are just a short drive away, making it even more convenient. As one of the highly-anticipated commercial projects in Gurgaon, Signature Global Signum Plaza 37D stands out with its well-designed retail shops in Gurgaon, all easily accessible from Hero Honda Chowk and Dwarka Expressway.



Signature Global Signum 37D-IV

Signum 37D-IV is a strategically positioned one of the commercial property near Dwarka Expressway. This Gurgaon establishment not only caters to the everyday needs of residents and consumers but also offers a diverse selection of stores, providing a comprehensive shopping experience. With its high-quality, low-maintenance commercial shops, this property presents an excellent investment opportunity. The favorable location and consumer demographics indicate a promising business potential, while the affordability of these commercial shops in Gurgaon ensures a thriving hub for commerce.


Signature Global Signum Plaza 4

Signum Plaza 4, a collection of exceptional commercial shops situated within the Signature Global Park 4&5 residential complex in Sector 36 Sohna, south of Gurgaon. These commercial shops in Sohna cater to a vast consumer base and are considered among the finest commercial establishments in the area. Strategically located along the bustling Delhi-Mumbai Corridor, this property offers a prime location for business. With high-quality, low-maintenance shops, it presents an excellent investment opportunity and stands as one of the most sought-after commercial projects in Sohna.



Signature Global SCO Plot 36, Sohna

SCO Plot 36 Sohna by Signature Global is an innovative real estate concept that offers a harmonious blend of office and retail spaces. Situated in Sector 36 Sohna, south of Gurgaon, this project encompasses 5.21 acres of commercial plots in sohna. These plots are designed to accommodate low-rise developments with multiple floors for commercial shops and offices. It provides an ideal setting for establishing and expanding businesses. With world-class amenities and lucrative investment opportunities, this commercial property in Sohna ensures high returns for customers. The project enjoys excellent connectivity to Sohna-Gurgaon Road and the Delhi-Mumbai Industrial Corridor Project (DMIC). Surrounding this development are luxury residential projects, affordable housing options, and renowned schools, colleges, and universities, creating a vibrant and thriving environment.


In conclusion, the sectors of new Gurgaon highlighted above offer a wealth of promising opportunities for commercial space investment. Among the industry leaders, Signature Global emerges as a standout brand, known for its exceptional offerings in the commercial sector. Whether you are an investor looking to capitalize on Gurgaon’s booming commercial market or a business seeking an ideal location, these sectors and Signature Global can fulfill your aspirations.
